Jacuzzi, Storeroom, Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Intercom, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, Alarm System, Window guards, Elevator, Heating system: gas, electricity, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 European style apartment in newly renovated expensive modern (Hi-Tech, Black and White color) well designed  at #55 Barnovi str. (near the building of Chinese Embassy), newly constructed building, huge windows and balconies providing excellent panoramic view on the city, equipped with beautiful, new Italian furniture, Italian kitchen, including fridge, washing machine, individual heating and air-conditioning systems, cable-LCD TV, central heating, A/C,  gas stove with oven,  gas exhauster, 3 big balconies, security system, safe neighborhoods.

details.address: Tbilisi, Old Tbilisi,  Vera, Barnovi st.
